vote.title: To celebrate the grand opening of Resolve Fitness and note the importance of physical health to overall well-being
vote.description:
Title
To celebrate the grand opening of Resolve Fitness and note the importance of physical health to overall well-being
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Resolve Fitness, an urban gym, celebrated the highly-anticipated grand opening of its facility in downtown Columbus on Saturday, July 8th; and,
 
WHEREAS, Resolve Fitness features over 10,000 square feet of workout space, with fitness offerings including boxing, weightlifting, cardio, and cycling; and,
 
WHEREAS, Resolve Fitness aims to create an accessible, community-driven space where health and wellness thrive and members leave with a memorable experience; and,
 
WHEREAS, physical health is a critical component of an individual’s overall well-being; and,
 
WHEREAS, poor physical health is linked to numerous negative health impacts, including sub-optimal mental health, higher rates of chronic disease, like high blood pressure and heart disease, and even increased risk of certain cancers; and,
 
WHEREAS, it is imperative that Columbus continues to expand the accessibility of high-quality fitness offerings to its residents as a matter of both public health and quality of life; and,
 
WHEREAS, the grand opening of Resolve Fitness illustrates the increasing need for more accessible fitness opportunities and will aid in improving the physical health of many residents of downtown Columbus; now, therefore:
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS: That this Council does hereby celebrate the grand opening of Resolve Fitness and supports any efforts or initiatives that promote the overall well-being of Columbus residents.
